survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify pain points related to ergonomics in home workspaces, focusing on comfort, productivity, and health impacts.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., back pain, eye strain) while working from your home workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown if used.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., back pain, eye strain) while working from your home workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use in your home workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use in your home workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home workspace setup in terms of ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Include a visual slider for better engagement on desktop.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with optional slider UI.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home workspace setup in terms of ergonomics?

questions.question_text: What is the primary barrier preventing you from improving your home workspace ergonomics?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'
questions.client_notes: Add an open-text field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with conditional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary barrier preventing you from improving your home workspace ergonomics?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 response is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific ergonomic challenges you face in your home workspace.
questions.client_notes: Limit response to 300 characters. Use a textarea input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific ergonomic challenges you face in your home workspace.

questions.question_text: Has your employer provided any support (financial or otherwise) for improving your home workspace ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear binary + opt-out option.

script.question_text: Has your employer provided any support (financial or otherwise) for improving your home workspace ergonomics?

questions.question_text: Which of the following actions do you take to mitigate ergonomic issues? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Randomize options to reduce order bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following actions do you take to mitigate ergonomic issues? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On average, how many hours per day do you spend working at your home workspace?

script.question_text: On average, how many hours per day do you spend working at your home workspace?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a virtual consultation with an ergonomics specialist to improve your home workspace?
questions.client_notes: Include a follow-up email capture if 'Yes' or 'Maybe' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with conditional logic for email capture.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in a virtual consultation with an ergonomics specialist to improve your home workspace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to invest in ergonomic improvements for your home workspace in the next 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with tooltips for clarity.

script.question_text: How likely are you to invest in ergonomic improvements for your home workspace in the next 6 months?
